meanings.definition: A small, horn-like projection on the abdomen of an aphid.
meanings.sent1: The tiny cornicle on the aphid's abdomen helps it defend against predators.
meanings.sent2: I observed the cornicle on the aphid while studying its anatomy.
meanings.sent3: The aphid thought its cornicle was a fashionable accessory.
meanings.sent4: The cornicle of the aphid stood out like a beacon in the grass.
meanings.sent5: The cornicle of the aphid looked like a miniature unicorn horn.

meanings.definition: A small, horn-like projection on the abdomen of certain insects.
meanings.sent1: The insect's cornicle was barely visible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the cornicle of certain insects to understand their biology better.
meanings.sent3: The cornicle of the insect wiggled comically when it moved.
meanings.sent4: The cornicle of the insect gleamed in the sunlight like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The cornicle of the insect was as sharp as a needle.

meanings.definition: A small, horn-like projection on the abdomen of some arthropods.
meanings.sent1: The arthropod's cornicle served as a unique identifier for the species.
meanings.sent2: I marveled at the intricate design of the arthropod's cornicle.
meanings.sent3: The cornicle of the arthropod twitched nervously in the presence of danger.
meanings.sent4: The cornicle of the arthropod cast a shadow like a miniature tower.
meanings.sent5: The cornicle of the arthropod was a striking feature of its appearance.
